text: 16:17-18 Luk 10:19; Aposel 2:4; 5:16; 8:7; 10:46; 28:3-9; 1 Korin 12:10; 12:28; Jems 5:14-15Eghtɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itiba, mirakelɨn arazir kaba uaghan me bativam: me nan ziamɨn duar kuraba batoghɨva, me nguibabar akar fozir puvatɨzibav kɨmɨva, egh kuruziba uan dafaribar dar suigham. Egh me imezir dɨpar ariaghiritam rameghtɨ a tong men navibagh asɨghasighan kogham. Egh me uan dafariba isɨ arɨmariar gumazamizibar arɨghtɨ men arɨmariaba gɨvam.”
